text: Benton Cheung Yan-lung, CBE, OStJ, JP (18 April 1922 – 19 September 2021) was a Hong Kong businessman and politician. He was a member of the Legislative Council of Hong Kong from 1981 to 1991 and chairman of the Regional Council of Hong Kong and New Territories Heung Yee Kuk. Cheung died on 19 September 2021, at the age of 99.01消息：新界鄉議局前主席張人龍逝世終年103歲 龍琛路以其命名 ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Hong Kong businesspeople Category:Hong Kong politicians
title: Cheung Yan-lung
